extendedInfo.description: Puffin Web Browser is wicked fast, and It is the #1 Flash browser. Once users experience the thrill of using Puffin, regular mobile Internet just feels like torture. Puffin Web Browser is the premium version of the Puffin family, and comes with unlimited Adobe Flash hours.Features:â Incredible Loading Speed â Adobe Flash Supportâ Download to Cloud (Up to 100M per file)â Theater mode for Flash video and gameâ Virtual Trackpad (Mouse Simulator) â Virtual Gamepadâ Add-ons functions (Pocket, Evernote, Facebook, Translator and more)â Color Theme for Toolbar and Slidebar â Fastest JavaScript Engineâ Full Web Experience ï¼Desktop view and mobile viewï¼==== Limitations ====* The data centers of Puffin Web Browser are in the US and the cloud servers can only access public web sites from US geolocations. * For users outside the US, local content, especially videos of local interest, may not be accessible from the US due to geo-restrictions in your home country.For more information, please check our FAQ: http://www.puffinbrowser.com/faq/

reviews.title: Genius
reviews.comment: The best Web browser app by far. You can do anything! Literally. Well worth the couple dollars.
reviews.author: Devin Sievers

reviews.title: Fab
reviews.comment: A must have for any Android device. And iPad as well! Fast browser and supports Flash. Great customer service too!
reviews.author: \312\273 Marion \312\274

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: And I had a problem learning grab and drop the makers where quick to respond and help me with my how to? I think this is an amazing app. Def. worth more than it\'s value. Get it!
reviews.author: Terri Foster

reviews.title: Very Fast with Flash Support!
reviews.comment: A great job on providing the fastest page loads. The additional fact that Flash works perfectly makes this browser the best choice!
reviews.author: Frederick LoManto

reviews.title: Flash?
reviews.comment: I got the  paid version and the browser wouldnt work with some flash websites! It says plugin not supported. In other words, useless. Nexus10 user.
reviews.author: Renata Novellino

reviews.title: Totally awesome browser
reviews.comment: Hooray for this app. I can watch South Park episodes on the South Park studios website now with my tablet and phone. Thank you so much to the makers of this app.  If you need to be hit in the head with a tackehammer sometimes like me to see the obvious, to go fullscreen on video hit settings, then theater mode :)
reviews.author: Beverly Zellner

reviews.title: THE FASTEST ANDROID WEB BROWSER
reviews.comment: It supports most flash player stuff but sound and video playback is a bit glitchy instead of smooth pc. But I also use the low end lg optimus q black pre paid. If that could be fixed even better
reviews.author: eric ringland

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Best browser I\'ve used on android! :-)
reviews.author: Patrick Jackson

reviews.title: Concept is great, needs stability
reviews.comment: The concept of this great and to take it to the next level I believe that stability of the connection should have focus.  Loss of connection for even a second calls for a complete refresh of a page by default.  This can mean loss of form data and re-entering can be  a pain.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need text wrapping!
reviews.comment: Please add text wrapping! It will make a big difference.! Please TEXT WRAPPING! Flash don\'t work in some mobile websites.
reviews.author: ed robles

reviews.title: Good, not great
reviews.comment: I decided to get the browser for it\'s speed and flash support, which works. Few issues prevent 5 stars. Physical keyboard shortcuts do not work. I don\'t like how it restores tabs after closing, when I reopen, I want to start fresh. Will not respond when getting redirected to a sign in page on a private network, have to use default browser first. Last, no incognito mode that I saw. As these get fixed, I will give higher ratings.
reviews.author: Charles Lee

reviews.title: Outdated flash??
reviews.comment: I have the paid version..love being able to play flash games on my phone.  But today I am unable to because it tells me flash is outdated ..How do I update it? ?xxx email I recieved from puffin said flash will be updated later this year.. I wonder why not sooner.seems they would do it asap to keep paying customers happy. I gave 5 stars when I purchased but taking it down to 3 until its fixed.
reviews.author: Penny Foster

reviews.title: Could be better, but still nice and fast.
reviews.comment: The browser is nicely featured and quite fast.  It does have flash support for flash videos.  I have had difficulty with most of them being choppy and with part of the picture being black and digitized though.  I hope for improvement in the future.  I have only tried it out on one device, so it is also possible that it would work better for other customers on their devices.  There are browsers out there that I like better that are free, granted they do not have flash support.
reviews.author: Brandon Poulsen

reviews.title: flash works great but
reviews.comment: the flash works great but the text boxes are frustrating as hell. as you click a new box it moves the first letter to the end. so you have to retype each box. Lame but GOTTA HAVE FLASH!!!!
reviews.author: Trey Newton

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: This browser has a huge waste on the bottom of the screen of space on some pages that you cannot get rid of. The end result is that you cannot get the whole page to view properly.
reviews.author: Ben Spigener

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I love the new update, you have been working hard to bring us the new outlook. Its great i give you 10*. Thanks
reviews.author: brendon channing

reviews.title: Puffin Web Browser on ONDA V812 Tablet
reviews.comment: I test Puffin web Browser won\'t run my ONDA V812 Android 4.2.2 Jelly Bean Tablet has 64-bit Quad Core CPU Allwinner A31 I try Uncheck Disable a Force GPU Rendering that ever won\'t works going websites, I still waiting check for update newer version automatically via Google Play app?
reviews.author: Ray Foisel

reviews.comment: Only browser found so far that lets me use facebook games etc so well reccomended!
reviews.author: david lathen
